description: The Teca Windbreaker is ideal for windy ridge hikes, breezy bike rides, and minimalist travel. Plus, this windbreaker is made from unique repurposed materials, which means each one is limited edition. Also available in women’s.
name: Cotopaxi Teca Half-Zip Windbreaker - Mens

specs.value: Repurposed Polyester Taffeta with DWR Finish and 600 mm PU Backer
Repurposed Polyester Ripstop with DWR Finish and 600 mm PU Backer
